excerpt: "The fact that only a few short months ago very few people were aware of a strange new illness in Wuhan, China, is difficult to imagine now. Indeed, it was BlueDot, a Toronto-based artificial intelligence and Big Data company, that accurately predicted the emergence of a new virus in Wuhan back in mid-December.
